title: Modern house for sale in Colombo 5
details: This well designed 3 storey house is located just 80m away from Havelock Road, in a residential area. Built on 10 perches of land. It has a building area of over 4,200 sq.ft (includes 3 floors). It has 6 bedrooms and 5 washrooms, It also has a maid's quarters and a front garden. The house can be used as 2 independent units and has separate access. There is basement parking space for 3 vehicles. Price Rs. 125Mn. Negotiable.
